listItems.text: Text checked and free from spelling, grammatical, factual and formatting errors
Page titles and meta data (e.g. meta description and open graph tags) present, unique and descriptive
Images have appropriate alt attribute (alt='' if decorative)
Schema markup included if appropriate
Navigation easy to find and use, and all links working
404 page created and serving correctly
All legally required pages and statements created, depending on your industry and location. (e.g. GDPR/Cookie policy, Modern Slavery Statement etc)
Footer copyright notice included, year(s) correct and creative commons license included if desired
Forms working correctly and email notifications reaching correct people
Contact details correct and easy to find
Links to social media accounts present and correct
Website tested and working in all targeted browsers
Website tested and working on mobile devices and tablets
All code tested and functioning correctly. Check W3C benchmarks for front end if desired.
No Javascript console logs, errors or warnings
Website run through Lighthouse and any performance issues resolved
HTML, CSS and JS files minified and concatenated where possible
Images and videos adequate quality and compressed where possible
Print stylesheet set up and functioning if content is likely to be printed (e.g. a recipe website)
Website run through Lighthouse and any accessibility issues resolved
Links are easily recognisable and have a clear focus state
All form fields have associated labels (not placeholder text)
ARIA landmark roles used where appropriate
Website tested and useable with a screen reader
Domain name set up and DNS pointed correctly to web server (either your own or a hosted solution like Netlify)
Server backups configured and working if required
SSL certificate installed
Project files integrated with version control and build/deploy paths set up
Set up an uptime monitoring service to monitor availability and be alerted if the site goes down
CDN and/or caching solution configured if appropriate
Analytics tracking installed and working
Event tracking set up and tracking key metrics (other than page views)
Search console account set up and linked
Favicon included and linked correctly
Redirects to old pages which no longer exist set up
All versions of URL redirecting to same format (e.g. abc.com redirecting to www.abc.com)
robots.txt file not blocking search engine spiders
Progressive Web App features configured if required
